value.title: Dynamically remove columns that contain a specific word in the header - Power Query
value.excerpt: It is very common when importing data from excel or pdfs that you get a lot of empty columns. In today's video I will show you how to remove those columns dynamically using power query.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power

value.title: Easily add query parameters to your source paths in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this tutorial, I show you how to easily add query parameters into your source paths using the advance editor function. value.title: Insert text anywhere in a cell without adding a new column using the Power Query User Interface.
value.excerpt: There are no Insert functions ( that I know about) in the power query user interface, so if you dont know M, you probably have to create a new column to insert text in power query.  In today's video, I will show you how you can use power query user interface, to insert text into a column without adding

value.title: Intro to data modeling (Part2): Snowflake vs star vs galaxy schemes in Power BI

value.title: Is MANY TO MANY, too many? | Power BI many to many relationships explained

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
value.excerpt: Which tool is best? Power BI or Excel?  Well, it depends on what you are trying to do. Both tools have unique strengths and limitations and in this video I will try to show both.  Hopefully after watching this video, you will have a better understanding of both tools and will know when to use which depending

value.title: Refresh Power BI every second or minute!
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you how to refresh Power BI every minute or any interval you yet :). value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI.
